description: The emergence of the Internet and the rapid development of ICT offers the possibility of developing virtual spaces to offer different educational proposals remote, blended or as support for both synchronous and asynchronous presentiality aimed at people who are geographically dispersed, temporarily or permanent. These virtual spaces are not all equal and constantly evolving design and functionality, one of the key aspects is the quality of the dialogue being promoted to facilitate learning. That is why, currently there are countless ways to develop them taking into account dynamic interrelationships between the content, the role of educators and students, learning and interaction that favor the educational process.
title: Entornos virtuales de aprendizaje: entre la presencialidad y la virtualidad
